mapper.select: SELECT R.RES_NO, R.START_DATE, R.END_DATE, M.ADDRESS, M.CA_STATUS, P.P_TITLE, P.CARE_LIST, P.P_NO, A.FILE_PATH AS FILE_PATH, A.ORIGIN_NAME, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM REVIEW WHERE REF_RESNO = R.RES_NO) AS REVIEW_COUNT, CASE WHEN REV.REV_NO IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS REVIEW_STATUS FROM RESERVATION R JOIN MEMBER M ON R.USER_NO = M.USER_NO JOIN PETSITTER P ON R.REF_PNO = P.P_NO LEFT JOIN P_ATTACHMENT A ON P.P_NO = A.REF_PNO LEFT JOIN REVIEW REV ON R.RES_NO = REV.REF_RESNO WHERE R.USER_NO = #{userNo} AND R.STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY R.START_DATE DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO REVIEW(REV_NO, REV_TITLE, REV_CONTENT, CREATE_DATE, STATUS, FILE_PATH, REF_RESNO) VALUES(SEQ_REVIEW.NEXTVAL, #{revTitle}, #{revContent}, SYSDATE, DEFAULT, #{filePath}, #{rNo})
mapper.select: SELECT REV_TITLE, REV_CONTENT, FILE_PATH, REF_RESNO, START_DATE, END_DATE FROM REVIEW JOIN RESERVATION ON RES_NO = REF_RESNO WHERE REF_RESNO = #{rNo}
mapper.update: UPDATE REVIEW SET REV_TITLE = #{revTitle}, REV_CONTENT = #{revContent}, CREATE_DATE = SYSDATE, FILE_PATH = #{filePath} WHERE REF_RESNO = #{rNo} AND STATUS = 'Y'
mapper.select: SELECT START_DATE, END_DATE, REGISTER_DATE, RES_NO, CONTENT, D.FILE_PATH D_FILE_PATH, D.DOG_GENDER D_GENDER, D.DOG_NAME D_NAME, D.DOG_BREED D_BREED, PA.FILE_PATH FILE_PATH, PA.ORIGIN_NAME ORIGIN_NAME, M.USER_NAME USER_NAME, M.USER_NO USER_NO, R.REF_PNO REF_PNO, M.ADDRESS ADDRESS, M.FILE_PATH USER_FILE FROM RESERVATION R JOIN PETSITTER P ON R.REF_PNO = P.P_NO LEFT JOIN P_ATTACHMENT PA ON P.P_NO = PA.REF_PNO JOIN MEMBER M ON P.USER_NO = M.USER_NO LEFT JOIN DOG D ON M.USER_NO = D.USER_NO WHERE R.RES_NO = #{rNo}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM JOURNAL J JOIN RESERVATION R ON J.REF_RESNO = R.RES_NO JOIN MEMBER M ON R.USER_NO = M.USER_NO WHERE M.USER_NO = #{userNo} AND USER_NAME LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%'

SELECT J.J_NO, LISTAGG(JA.ORIGIN_NAME, ', ') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY JA.ORIGIN_NAME) AS ORIGIN_NAME, LISTAGG(JA.CHANGE_NAME, ', ') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY JA.CHANGE_NAME) AS CHANGE_NAME, JA.FILE_LEVEL, JA.FILE_PATH, R.STATUS, R.START_DATE, R.END_DATE, J.CREATE_DATE, M.USER_NAME, P.P_NO, M2.USER_NAME AS PETSITTER_NAME, REF_RESNO FROM JOURNAL J LEFT JOIN J_ATTACHMENT JA ON JA.REF_JNO = J.J_NO AND JA.FILE_LEVEL = 1 JOIN RESERVATION R ON J.REF_RESNO = R.RES_NO JOIN PETSITTER P ON R.REF_PNO = P.P_NO JOIN MEMBER M ON R.USER_NO = M.USER_NO JOIN MEMBER M2 ON P.USER_NO = M2.USER_NO WHERE M.USER_NO = #{userNo} AND J.STATUS = 'Y'
AND M2.USER_NAME LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
GROUP BY J.J_NO, JA.FILE_LEVEL, JA.FILE_PATH, R.STATUS, R.START_DATE, R.END_DATE, M.USER_NAME, P.P_NO, M2.USER_NAME, REF_RESNO, J.CREATE_DATE
ORDER BY J.CREATE_DATE DESC
ORDER BY J.CREATE_DATE ASC

SELECT J_NO, J_TITLE, J_CONTENT, TO_CHAR(J.CREATE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS CREATE_DATE, TO_CHAR(J.CREATE_DATE, 'AM HH:MI:SS') AS DAYS, JA.FILE_PATH, LISTAGG(ORIGIN_NAME, ', ') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY ORIGIN_NAME) AS ORIGIN_NAME, LISTAGG(CHANGE_NAME, ', ') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY CHANGE_NAME) AS CHANGE_NAME, REF_RESNO, USER_NAME FROM JOURNAL J LEFT JOIN J_ATTACHMENT JA ON J_NO = REF_JNO JOIN RESERVATION R ON REF_RESNO = RES_NO JOIN PETSITTER P ON R.REF_PNO = P.P_NO JOIN MEMBER M ON P.USER_NO = M.USER_NO WHERE J_NO = #{jno} GROUP BY J_NO, J_TITLE, J_CONTENT, TO_CHAR(J.CREATE_DATE, 'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS'), JA.FILE_PATH, REF_RESNO, J.CREATE_DATE, USER_NAME ORDER BY J.CREATE_DATE DESC

SELECT SUM(P.PAY_PRICE) FROM PAYMENT P JOIN RESERVATION R ON P.REF_RESNO = R.RES_NO JOIN PETSITTER PT ON R.REF_PNO = PT.P_NO JOIN MEMBER M ON PT.USER_NO = M.USER_NO WHERE M.USER_NO = #{userNo} AND P.PAY_DATE >= TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'IW') AND P.PAY_DATE < TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'IW') + 7
SELECT SUM(PAY_PRICE) FROM PAYMENT P JOIN RESERVATION R ON REF_RESNO = RES_NO JOIN PETSITTER PT ON REF_PNO = P_NO JOIN MEMBER M ON PT.USER_NO = M.USER_NO WHERE M.USER_NO = #{userNo}

SELECT PAY_NO, PAY_DATE, PAY_DESCRIPTION, PAY_PRICE, P.STATUS FROM PAYMENT P JOIN RESERVATION R ON REF_RESNO = RES_NO JOIN PETSITTER PT ON REF_PNO = P_NO JOIN MEMBER M ON PT.USER_NO = M.USER_NO WHERE M.USER_NO = #{userNo} AND P.STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY PAY_DATE DESC

SELECT ROWNUM, A.* FROM (SELECT RES_NO, R.STATUS STATUS, M.USER_NAME USER_NAME, R.START_DATE START_DATE, R.END_DATE END_DATE, R.REGISTER_DATE REGISTER_DATE, PAY_PRICE FROM RESERVATION R JOIN MEMBER M ON R.USER_NO = M.USER_NO LEFT JOIN PAYMENT P ON R.RES_NO = P.REF_RESNO JOIN PETSITTER PT ON R.REF_PNO = PT.P_NO WHERE PT.USER_NO = #{userNo} AND R.STATUS = 'Y'
AND USER_NAME LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
ORDER BY R.REGISTER_DATE DESC) A

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM RESERVATION R JOIN MEMBER M ON R.USER_NO = M.USER_NO JOIN PETSITTER PT ON R.REF_PNO = PT.P_NO WHERE PT.USER_NO = #{userNo}
AND USER_NAME LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%'

SELECT R.RES_NO, R.STATUS, R.START_DATE, R.END_DATE, R.REGISTER_DATE, R.CONTENT, M.USER_NAME, P.PAY_PRICE FROM RESERVATION R JOIN MEMBER M ON R.USER_NO = M.USER_NO LEFT JOIN PAYMENT P ON P.REF_RESNO = R.RES_NO WHERE RES_NO = #{rNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO JOURNAL (J_NO, J_TITLE, J_CONTENT, CREATE_DATE, STATUS, REF_RESNO) VALUES (SEQ_JOURNAL.NEXTVAL, #{careTitle}, #{careDesc}, SYSDATE, 'Y', #{cNo})
